Name: Pear Drop
Ingredients: 30 ml Belle de Brillet pear liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of pear wedge &/or pear drop hard candy.
Garnish with pear wedge on rim &/or serve with pear drop hard candy.
Review: Like the eponymous candy, this after-dinner/late-night cocktail has a full-on tangy pear flavour.
Nutrition: One serving of Pear Drop contains 168 calories
